snippet: A sharp fall in the price of emissions in Europe has highlighted the need for reforms to an important program.
abstract: Editorial calls on Europe to shore up collapsing market for carbon permits that has significantly undermined cap-and-trade system designed to reduce emissions; warns failure of system will discourage other regions from instituting their own programs; says despite recession-based troubles, system has reduced emissions by 14 percent in many sectors.
lead_paragraph: A sharp fall in the price of emissions in Europe has highlighted the need for reforms to an important program.
